FuncDef:
The link-state-family unicast command enables BGP-LS and displays the BGP-LS address family view.
The undo link-state-family unicast command deletes configurations from the BGP-LS address family.
By default, BGP-LS is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
BGP-LS provides a simple and efficient method of collecting topology information. To enable BGP-LS and enter the BGP-LS address family view, run the link-state-family unicast command.
Follow-up Procedure
Configure BGP-LS capabilities in the BGP-LS address family view.
